channel.title: Running my server
channel.description:
Howdy, i have got my pimpscape source, added the perfect compiler, and i have set up a no-ip, i have port fowarded (I think it is done right), i have moparscape on my computer, i havejdk 6u1. I have all this, and i assume that my server is set up by now? But my question is, how do i log into it? I have tried just clicking "start server" on mopar client, and then logging in. But it only led me to the defult hybird scape. i tried typing my no-ip into the ip section, and it had error, i tried my computers IP adress and it just said error. (I DO HAVE THE RUN happining in the perfect compiler when i try it.) Ca anyone please tell me how it is done?
P.S ( last year some time when i one all this private server things it was as simple as after getting no-ip and running the bat, and then clicking start server on morpar client, an logging in. and i would log into it.)

item.title: Running my server
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

As impulse and vorarg said type in with localhost,0.0.0.0 or just leave it blank and make sure you have runserver.bat running or it won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Running my server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You could log in with

127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Running my server
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Login with either of the following ips
leave it blank
localhost
0.0.0.0

Read full topic
